who_am_i_text: I'm @Ferfoui, I'm a student very interested by programming, I like video games and embedded softwares.
who_am_i_text_2: Mathematics is also one of my favorite subjects, it is so interesting to discover this beautiful universe.
java_level_text: I love Java, it is the paradise of object-oriented programming
kotlin_level_text: very cool language, close enough to Java, but with some nice features
python_level_text: experimented, I've learnt programming with Python
cpp_level_text: I have some experience, it's a great language, but I prefer Java
c_level_text: I know the basics, I'm using it to code on STM32
rust_level_text: very secure and very fun, so I'm still learning it
other_things_text: I'm also interested in electronics, I like to make small projects with ESP32 and STM32.
robotics_text: I also like robotics. I've participated to [FRC](https://www.firstinspires.org/robotics/frc) competitions with the [team 9220](https://frc-events.firstinspires.org/team/9220), and I went to New York for the [2025 NYC Regional](https://frc-events.firstinspires.org/2025/NYNY), it was a great experience!
currently_learning_text: I'm currently learning Rust and the [Ktor](https://ktor.io) Kotlin framework. I'm also learning Mandarin Chinese (It's more difficult than Java).
hobbies_text: I like to play video games, I also like to meet new people and to learn new things.
contact_text: You can send me a fax at 546-895-0145 (it's a joke).
